\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bags|strong="H3627"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w exile|strong="H1473"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w dug|strong="H2864"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* belongings \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* dusk, \w carrying|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* watched.

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, hasn’t \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w*?’

\w Tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* concerns \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*.’

\w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H3651"\w* am \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sign|strong="H4159"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.’ \w Just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w happened|strong="H6213"\w* \w here|strong="H3651"\w*,\f + \fr 12:11 \ft Literally ‘I am a sign to you.’ Just as I have done; some translators close the quotation at the end of the verse.\f* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*; \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H6213"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w into|strong="H3212"\w* \w exile|strong="H1473"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w captives|strong="H7628"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* dusk \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* bags \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H3802"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w dig|strong="H2864"\w* \w through|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* \w to|strong="H7307"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* attendants \w around|strong="H5439"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* troops, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w draw|strong="H7324"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w to|strong="H7307"\w* chase after \w them|strong="H5439"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w disperse|strong="H2219"\w* \w them|strong="H6327"\w* among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* \w them|strong="H6327"\w* throughout \w the|strong="H3588"\w* countries.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w spare|strong="H3498"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w few|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w*, \w so|strong="H4616"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w recount|strong="H5608"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*. \w Then|strong="H4616"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.”

\w Moreover|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7269"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w your|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w with|strong="H3899"\w* \w quivering|strong="H7269"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w anxiety|strong="H1674"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4616"\w* \w tell|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w about|strong="H3478"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w They|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w anxiety|strong="H1674"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* dread, \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* land \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w stripped|strong="H3456"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w* \w because|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w it|strong="H4393"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w laid|strong="H2717"\w* \w waste|strong="H2717"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.’” The Presumptuous Proverb

\w Again|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1697"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w go|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* fails’?

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w put|strong="H7673"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w end|strong="H7673"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w recite|strong="H4911"\w* \w it|strong="H7126"\w*.’ \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H7126"\w*: ‘\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w hand|strong="H7126"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* fulfilled.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w visions|strong="H2377"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w flattering|strong="H2509"\w* divinations \w within|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,
